  2. Nicolas Cage admits he is 'terrified' of his likeness being used by AI  Entertainment Weekly News
  3. Nicolas Cage Is ‘Terrified’ of AI and Got Digitally Scanned for Spider-Man Noir: ‘I Don’t Want You to Do Anything’ With My Face and Body ‘When I’m Dead’  Variety
  4. Nicolas Cage Shares 1 Thing He's 'Terrified' Will Happen After He Dies  HuffPost
  5. Nicolas Cage Says He’s Terrified AI Will "Steal" His Body  Futurism
